title: Comments on December Employment Report
full_text: Comments on December Employment Report. The headline jobs number in the December employment report was slightly below expectations, however October and November were revised down b.... The headline jobs number in the December employment report was slightly below expectations, however October and November were revised down by 76,000. The unemployment rate decreased to 4.4%. Earlier… [+2724 chars]
